posts.postText:
i was playing a jailbreak server and people where on the simon says wall there was a guard close to a prisoner and i thought the prisoner punched the guard so i killed him. then an admin banned me with no warning and banning without warning (i hear) is against the rules of garry's mod. Even if its not a garry's mod rule admins should still give you a warning before they even think about banning you.
